hero.name: Théo
hero.description: Computer Science Master's student, combining AI development and project management.

story.title: My Story
paragraphs: Passionate about computer science from a young age, I discovered the transformative power of technology. Currently pursuing a Master's in Computer Science, I specialize in developing innovative web and mobile applications.
My approach combines artistic creativity and technical rigor to create digital experiences that leave a lasting impression. Each project is an opportunity to explore new technological horizons.

master.description: Specialization in Artificial Intelligence and Advanced Web Development

bachelor.description: Comprehensive training in programming, algorithms, and systems

goelan.subtitle: AI Chatbot for Student Guidance
goelan.description: AI-powered conversational agent for academic guidance, enhanced with university-specific contextual information through Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG).

llm-personalization.subtitle: Large Language Model Customization and Deployment
llm-personalization.description: Discovery and application of different types of large language model customization: prompting, RAG and fine-tuning.

aruco.subtitle: ArUco Augmented Reality: 3D lung models from infected chest X-rays
aruco.description: Augmented reality to visualize 3D lung models from infected chest X-rays (CXR). It uses ArUco markers to detect and overlay 3D models on images in real time.

nutritrack.subtitle: Food management
nutritrack.description: NutriTrack is a food tracking app for detailed diet monitoring. Record meals, track nutrition, and improve eating habits for healthier living.

resume.title: My Journey
resume.subtitle: Discover my professional evolution and achievements

goelan.title: AI Developer
goelan.description: Created an AI conversational agent for student guidance at the University of Haute-Alsace. Developed an intelligent chatbot to assist students with academic orientation and educational choices.

unsolite.title: Full-Stack Developer Intern
unsolite.description: Continuous development and integration of a SaaS event management solution. Built features including 3D visualization, QR code management, and real-time WebSocket-based chat system.

bachelor.title: Bachelor's in Computer Science and Mobile Computing
